description: Listed Building consent for the erection of a single storey rear canopy incorporating the installation of rear bi-foldings doors, the replacement of windows and internal alterations
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Reason: To accord with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation areas) Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [LXA-2137-010-EX, LXA-2137-011-EX, LXA-2137-012-EX, LXA-2137-050, LXA-2137-051, LXA-2137-60, LXA-2137-61, LXA-2137-062, LXA-2137-200A-ELE, LXA-2137-200B-ELE, LXA-2137-101-GA, LXA-2137-102-GA, Cover Letter, Reasonable Exception Statement for fire safety and Flood Risk Matrix. Received: 1/3/2024
SW1-01SX Revision E and BF1-12SX Revision A. Received: 8/3/2024
LXA-2137-200E, LXA-2137-200G, Design Statement and Windows Condition Assessment. Received: 1/5/2024
LXA-2137-100-GA, LXA-2137-200D, LXA-2137-200F, LXA-2137-200H, LXA-2137-200-ELE. Received: 31/5/2024].
Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good for the retained fabric, shall match the original work in type, colour, texture, profile and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution, including facebond and pointing. 
Reason: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic features of the listed building (and/or the character of the Conservation Area).
